notes: Marine actives specialist now part of Symrise. Marine Elastin (hydrolyzed elastin from marine sources) for skin elasticity. Exsy-ARL™ algae-derived firming complex. Marine peptides for collagen/elastin synthesis stimulation. Sea fennel extracts for elastin protection. Specialization in marine-derived ingredients with sustainable sourcing. Strong focus on efficacy and bioavailability. COSMOS and Ecocert certified. Global distribution through Symrise network. Excellent for marine-themed product lines and premium anti-aging formulations. Suitable for brands emphasizing marine ingredients and sustainability.
